doc.title: Forests of Mystery
doc.plot: Forests of Mystery is an ongoing collection of Video Case Files. They follow the adventures of undergraduate forest research students, Dewey Lansing and Jeff Collins. Dewey and Jeff they try to piece together the strange and unusual anomalies that have been happening near the Cascade Forest Research Center, located inside the deep woods of the Oregon Coast Range. Armed with just a video camera and their determination, these two friends venture into the great unknown. They are prepared to discover the truth behind what is really going on out there at all costs. Watch as their inquiries take them from Pacific Cascade University to a used book store, from a property of a crazy man to right into the thick of danger. Will they make it out alive and unscathed? In this original series of adventure and suspense, anything can happen and anything goes; expect the unexpected and the unexplained.
